Here are suggestions to improve the UX: ## Recommendations: 1. **Provide a more meaningful example with explanation**: - Currently, the example `+BER-GF-SW-BW-1F-DR-ES-TSLA-101 +01*` is hard to understand without context - Add a brief explanation of what this search would do 2. **Use a more relatable example**: - Choose an example that relates to common user tasks - Break down the components of the example to show how it works 3. **Add visual structure**: - Use color or highlighting to emphasize the special syntax characters - Consider separating the example into smaller, digestible parts ## Implementation Example: ```tsx
Example
+DCN-2023 +"Tesla Model 3"
This will find documents that contain both the code "DCN-2023" AND the exact phrase "Tesla Model 3"
``` This approach would: - Use a clearer, more intuitive example - Explain exactly what the search will do - Visually separate the example from the explanation - Use familiar terminology that matches users' mental models The improved version helps users understand not just the syntax but the practical application of complex search queries. update the ux, not the text # Improving the UX of the Search Query Help Tooltip (Layout Only) Here's how to improve the UX of the example section without changing the content text: ```tsx
Example
+BER-GF-SW-BW-1F-DR-ES-TSLA-101 +01*
+ requires the term * wildcard matching
``` This implementation: 1. **Improves visual presentation**: - Adds padding and background color to create a distinct example area - Uses a border and rounded corners to frame the example - Displays the code in a monospace font on a white background for better readability 2. **Adds visual explanation**: - Creates small visual indicators explaining the syntax symbols - Uses color-coding to highlight the special characters 3. **Improves spacing and hierarchy**: - Better margins between elements - More distinct separation between title and content These enhancements make the example more visually appealing and easier to understand without changing any of the original text content.
